java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class UINodeContentDialog
extends UIDialog

This dialog displays a tabbedpane holding various panels with Node information.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Parameters:
parent, - the parent frame for this dialog.
view - com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, the current view.
uinode - com.compendium.ui.UINode, the node to display the contents for, (if in a map).
selectedTab, - the tabbed panel to initially select when opening this dialog.

UINodeContentDialog

public UINodeContentDialog(javax.swing.JDialog parent,
                           NodeSummary node,
                           int selectedTab)
Constructor. Initialized this dialog. This is used by the UISearchResultsDialog / UISelectViewDialog which does not have a specific view associated.

Parameters:
parent - the parent dialog for this dialog.
node - the node to display the contents for.
selectedTab - the tabbed panel to initially select when opening this dialog.

UINodeContentDialog

public UINodeContentDialog(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                           NodeSummary node,
                           int selectedTab)
Constructor. Initialized this dialog. This is used by the UIHintNodeLabelPanel which does not have a specific view associated, and passed the main panel as the parent. Also used by UIOutlineView.

Parameters:
parent - the parent frame for this dialog.
node - the node to display the contents for.
selectedTab - the tabbed panel to initially select when opening this dialog.

view - the current view.
